items.title: Transfer rumors, news: Man City to rival Arsenal for rising Spain star Mendoza
items.description: Arsenal may have to compete with Manchester City to sign Elche midfielder Rodrigo Mendoza. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

items.title: Cowboys remain hot, will play 'anybody, anywhere'
items.description: The Cowboys have won three straight games for the first time since 2023.

items.title: 'Proud to be back': QB Burrow has 2 TDs in win
items.description: After missing more than two months with a turf toe injury that required surgery, Bengals QB Joe Burrow threw two touchdowns in a 32-14 win at the Rave...

items.title: Lamar cites consistency amid turnovers, slump
items.description: Ravens QB Lamar Jackson insisted after Thursday's loss to the Bengals there is one solution to get out of his career-worst slump: consistency.

items.title: Mahomes: Chiefs 'got to win every game now'
